dataset_id: MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover 8-Day L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG V006
title: MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover 8-Day L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG V006
summary: This data set reports the maximum percentage of snow-covered land during an eight-day period in 0.05 degree (approx. 5 km) resolution Climate Modeling Grid (CMG) cells. Percentages are computed from snow cover observations in the MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover 8-Day L3 Global 500m Grid (MYD10A2) data set. Persistent cloud cover is also reported.
